Crypto institutional adoption and regulatory clarity
Rate policy uncertainty and monetary easing expectations
Tech sector leadership and mega-cap momentum
Options dealer positioning and max pain dynamics
risk_factors: Mega-cap tech divergences (NVDA/AAPL underperformance) signaling potential leadership failure
NDX technical support breakdown risk at channel retest
Absence of bearish analysis creating consensus vulnerability to mean reversion
Regulatory headline risk in crypto and traditional finance sectors
Geopolitical tensions (US-China semiconductor policy, exchange security vulnerabilities)
